alert.note: Alert for San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:49PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Emery County through 630 PM MDT... At 549 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 25 miles southwest of Green River, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Emery County. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 between mile markers 136 and 159. US Route 6 between mile markers 288 and 300. Utah Route 24 between mile markers 142 and 160. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Rafael Swell; Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs
